name: Element
description: The Element class is the base class for all Revit elements. It provides common functionality for all elements in a document.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: Gets the ElementId of the element.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: Gets or sets the name of the element.

properties.name: Category
properties.description: Gets the category of the element.

properties.name: Parameters
properties.description: Gets the parameters of the element.

properties.name: Pinned
properties.description: Gets or sets whether the element is pinned.

properties.name: Location
properties.description: Gets the location of the element.

properties.name: Document
properties.description: Gets the document that owns the element.

properties.name: UniqueId
properties.description: Gets the unique identifier for the element.

methods.name: Delete()
methods.description: Deletes the element from the document.

methods.name: SetParameterByName(String, Object)
methods.description: Sets a parameter value by name.

methods.name: GetParameterValueByName(String)
methods.description: Gets a parameter value by name.
